title: Burn The Ships
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Burn The Ships par For KING & COUNTRY
[Luke Smallbone]
How did we get here?
All castaway on a lonely shore
I can see in your eyes, dear
It's hard to take for a moment more
We've got to

[ Joel Smallbone]
Burn the ships, cut the ties
Send a flare into the night
Say a prayer, turn the tide
Dry your tears and wave goodbye

[Luke Smallbone]
Step into a new day
We can rise up from the dust and walk away

We can dance upon our heartache, yeah
So light a match, leave the past, burn the ships
And don't you look back

[Luke Smallbone]
Don't let it arrest you
This fear is fear of fallin' again
And if you need a refuge
I will be right here until the end
Oh, it's time to

[ Joel Smallbone]
Burn the ships, cut the ties
Send a flare into the night
Say a prayer, turn the tide
Dry your tears and wave goodbye

[Luke Smallbone]

Step into a new day
We can rise up from the dust and walk away
We can dance upon our heartache, yeah
So light a match, leave the past, burn the ships
And don't you look back

[ Joel Smallbone]
So long to shame, walk through the sorrow
Out of the fire into tomorrow
So flush the pills, face the fear
Feel the wave disappear
We're comin' clear, we're born again
Our hopeful lungs can breathe again
Oh, we can breathe again

[Luke Smallbone]
Step into a new day
We can rise up from the dust and walk away

We can dance upon our heartache, yeah
So light a match, leave the past, burn the ships
And step into a new day
We can rise up from the dust and walk away
We can dance upon our heartache, yeah
So light a match, leave the past, burn the ships
And don't you look back

[ Luke Smallbone]
And don't you look back
And don't you look back
